name: PEBBLES (gensuta)
description:
A game made in a week during April 2019 for my Intro to Game Development class.
Note: The build screen is cropped a teeny bit right now, but it will be fixed and re-built eventually.

Pebbles, the protagonist, really likes to collect pebbles, but they accidentally lost a bunch of them in their mother’s magic castle! You, the player, must collect all the pebbles in each hallway without walking too much. If you take too many steps, you might just get cursed!
